title: ABVP Credits Delhi University Poll Victory to PM Narendra Modi, Student Activism
content:
20:16 IST 

ABVP student leaders celebrate after winning the Delhi University Students' Union Polls. (Press Trust of India) 
New Delhi: Akhil Bhartiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) which swept the Delhi University Students' Union (DUSU) polls for the second consecutive year today, credited the "Modi wave" and the party's student activism for its victory. 
"The schemes which have been launched by the central government benefiting youth such as Make in India, skill development which will generate more employment opportunities, have been welcomed by the youth as what we call as Modi wave, DU voters belonging to the same age group voted for us," ABVP National Secretary, Rohit Chahal said. 

Show Full Article 

Story first published: Sep 12, 2015 20:16 IST
